text: I talked with an interesting guy recently, George Song, who ran a development agency in the San Francisco area for over a decade. He recently moved to Portland, and is interested in setting up apprenticeships for underrepresented people in tech, teaching development craft and soft skills that set people up for success in the field.
He’s looking for apprenticeship candidates, so if you can think of anyone who might be interested, I’d be happy to pass names along.
